## dessmlify() function

Removes tags <speak> &amp; </speak> from SSML

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function dessmlify(str: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | String to remove <speak> tags. |

<b>Returns:</b>

String without <speak> tags.
